short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download all your videos from Flip.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Is the potential closure of Flip.com causing concern for your irreplaceable video content?  Save The Flip, a browser extension offers a seamless solution. Download all your Flip.com videos in one click, eliminating the need for time-consuming, individual downloads.  Safeguard your cherished memories, from educational content to heartwarming moments, before they vanish.  Save The Flip empowers you to take control and permanently preserve your Flip.com treasures for future enjoyment.
